lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Attempts to hold currency rates rigidly within tight ranges through European Monetary System intramarginal intervention can be counterproductive, bringing funds into the stronger currency from the weaker at rates still considered fairly favourable, the Bundesbank said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The other danger was that money supply expansion could be caused in the stronger currency nation without its central bank being involved in the activity.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "For this reason, currency levels should be allowed as much room for manoeuvre as possible inside the band limits when a currency is in a phase of weakness," the Bundesbank said.
